Class ec.ezlib.prim.ResolutionNoticer 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ezlib.prim.ResolutionNoticer
public class ResolutionNoticer
extends Object
A callback object to be notified when a Promise gets resolved, ie, when it goes from DEFERRED to either KEPT or BROKEN. Used as argument to a "when" message. "when" can be e-sent to any object, and non-Sendables are always implicitly KEPT.

ResolutionNoticer()

noticeBroken(Throwable)
Should the Promise instead resolve by becoming BROKEN, this is notified with the Throwable describing the problem.
noticeKept(Object)
When the promise becomes KEPT, this is notified with the non-Promise resolution.

ResolutionNoticer 
 public ResolutionNoticer()

noticeKept 
 public void noticeKept(Object resolution)
When the promise becomes KEPT, this is notified with the non-Promise resolution.

noticeBroken 
 public void noticeBroken(Throwable problem)
Should the Promise instead resolve by becoming BROKEN, this is notified with the Throwable describing the problem.
